Class UserService

java.lang.Object
juancarlos.tfg.teleprompter.services.UserService
@Service public class UserService extends Object
Service class that handles user-related operations. Provides functionality for user management, authentication, and profile updates.
Author:
Juan Carlos

    • UserService

      public UserService()

  • Method Details

    • createUser

      public boolean createUser(User user)
      Creates a new user in the system. Sends a verification email to the user's email address.
      Parameters:
      user - The user object containing user details
      Returns:
      true if the user was created successfully, false otherwise

    • activateUser

      public String activateUser(String token)
      Activates a user account using the verification token.
      Parameters:
      token - The verification token sent to the user's email
      Returns:
      A message indicating the result of the activation attempt

    • requestPasswordReset

      public void requestPasswordReset(User user)
      Initiates the password reset process for a user. Sends a password reset email with a reset token.
      Parameters:
      user - The user requesting the password reset

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser(Long id)
      Deletes a user and all associated data from the system. This includes user files, teleprompter documents, and the user record.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user to delete

    • loadUserByUsername

      public User loadUserByUsername(String username)
      Loads a user by their username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to search for
      Returns:
      The user object if found, null otherwise

    • isUsernameTaken

      public boolean isUsernameTaken(String username, Long currentUserId)
      Checks if a username is already taken by another user.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to check
      currentUserId - The ID of the current user (to exclude from the check)
      Returns:
      true if the username is taken, false otherwise

    • isEmailTaken

      public boolean isEmailTaken(String email, Long currentUserId)
      Checks if an email is already taken by another user.
      Parameters:
      email - The email to check
      currentUserId - The ID of the current user (to exclude from the check)
      Returns:
      true if the email is taken, false otherwise

    • loadUserByEmail

      public User loadUserByEmail(String email)
      Loads a user by their email address.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address to search for
      Returns:
      The user object if found, null otherwise

    • loadUserById

      public User loadUserById(Long id)
      Loads a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user to load
      Returns:
      The user object if found, null otherwise

    • loadAllUsers

      public List<User> loadAllUsers()
      Loads all users in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all users

    • resetPassword

      public String resetPassword(String username, String email, String token, String password, boolean isLogged)
      Resets a user's password using a reset token or current session.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user
      email - The email of the user
      token - The reset token
      password - The new password
      isLogged - Whether the user is currently logged in
      Returns:
      A message indicating the result of the password reset

    • updateUser

      public boolean updateUser(User user)
      Updates the current user's profile information.
      Parameters:
      user - The user object containing updated information
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • updateUserById

      public boolean updateUserById(Long id, User user)
      Updates a user's profile information by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user to update
      user - The user object containing updated information
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • verifyPassword

      public boolean verifyPassword(User user, String rawPassword)
      Verifies if a provided password matches the user's stored password.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to verify the password for
      rawPassword - The password to verify
      Returns:
      true if the password matches, false otherwise
